GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v6.0.19
GSD.description:
usb: rndis_host: Secure rndis_query check against int overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit 39eadaf5611ddd064ad1c53da65c02d2b0fe22a4, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit ddda08624013e8435e9f7cfc34a35bd7b3520b6d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: rndis_host: Secure rndis_query check against int overflow
